channel.title: Hello, World! on Alterscope Solutions LLC
channel.description: Recent content in Hello, World! on Alterscope Solutions LLC

item.title: Conversee
item.description: Introducing Conversee, the revolutionary app that transcribes your speech and transforms your ideas into AI-generated images! Speak, imagine, and watch your words come to life like never before…

item.title: What If...
item.description: Welcome to What If, the app where your curiosity about the future meets the power of AI storytelling. Unveil a world of endless possibilities of personalized narratives of what lies ahead…

item.title: My Toddler Reads
item.description: My Toddler Reads is an engaging and interactive app designed to help young children learn to read by teaching them the sounds of letters and words. With its intuitive touch features, this app makes it easy for toddlers to sound out words and improve their reading skills…

item.title: Gradual Nightlight
item.description: Transform bedtime for your toddlers with our app! As a parent, I understand the bedtime challenge, which is why I created this app to make it easier for all of us. Use your phone as a reading light during story time and a nightlight for bedtime. What sets our app apart is its gradual screen dimming, ensuring a smooth transition from reading to sleep. Here’s why you’ll love our app…

item.title: Kanban AR
item.description: Introducing Kanban AR, the ultimate productivity app that revolutionizes the way you manage tasks and projects! With cutting-edge augmented reality technology, this app brings your kanban board to life, making task management a truly immersive experience…

item.title: iSwear Jar
item.description: The iSwear Jar gives you the power to create or destroy any habit. Simply imagine a dollar bill being thinly sliced by a paper shredder, turning cool cash into green slivers… Then imagine that dollar bill was yours, and that you surrendered it as a penalty for slipping up…

item.title: Contact / Support
item.description: An email address is required.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Information Collection, Use, and Sharing:

The content of your sessions within Alterscope Solutions software (i.e. microphone data, positional/rotational data, camera data, etc.) reside only on your local device. A temporary copy of the data is stored only when Alterscope Solutions software is in use, and it is destroyed when you exit Alterscope Solutions software.

We will not sell or rent any information collected through the use of Alterscope Solutions software or website to anyone.

item.title: Proximity Sense AR
item.description: Experience the world in a whole new way with Proximity Sense AR!Our innovative app uses augmented reality technology to sense the distance to objects around you and translate that information into a pattern of vibrations. Simply point your phone in front of you and let the vibrations guide you…

item.title: Lead the Way
item.description: Looking for a fun and interactive way to navigate your way to far off or nearby places? Look no further than Lead The Way! With Lead The Way, you can see a virtual sign post right in front of you that points you in the direction of your chosen location and displays the distance to your destination…

item.title: Gamma 40 Hertz
item.description: The Gamma 40 Hertz app gives you access to a quick brain boost. Some recent research suggests that 40 hertz gamma brain waves decline with age and that reversing the decline can be helpful. This app stimulates 40 hertz gamma waves through light, sound, and touch…

item.title: Cat Purr Generator
item.description: The Purrfect App brings you easy relaxation. using your phone’s vibration motor and synchronized animation to simulate a purring cat…

item.title: The Um Detector
item.description: Do you want to improve your speaking? Do find yourself yourself overusing filler words? This app will help you break the habit and speak more confidently. The Um Detector listens for when you say any these words…

item.title: Self Help Desk
item.description: What if you could see your situation from a new perspectives? What advice would you give? With this augmented reality simulation, you don’t have to imagine; you can experience. Explore the benefits of a thoughtful and private conversation…

item.title: The Alterscope
item.description: In this simulation, you begin by selecting a conversation partner. The conversation starts when you record a question or statement. You are then transported into the perspective of your conversation partner, where you can listen and respond to what was said. Continue the conversation…
